title: Caroline Flack shows off toned legs and honey-hued tresses as she sips pink champagne while naked
text:
She was recently spotted engaging in a blazing row with beau Lewis Burton during a boat trip in Ibiza.

But Caroline Flack looked more chilled on Saturday as she sipped pink champagne while posing totally naked in an extremely saucy social media post.

The Love Island presenter, 39, bared all in the racy celebratory snap, which was shared in a nod to finishing up her latest project.

Relaxed: Caroline Flack looked more chilled on Saturday as she sipped pink champagne while posing totally naked

Caroline had her honey-hued tresses swept over her shoulder as she balanced the half-empty champagne bottle on her raised knee.

The in-demand star showed off her envy-inducing figure and glowing features which were were enhanced by her make-up.

In a caption alongside the photo, Caroline wrote: 'Quite a week .. we’re having a little wrap party.'

It comes after the star's relationship with boyfriend Lewis, 28, seemed to be on the rocks as they engaged in a furious argument during their Spanish holiday last week.

Tempestuous: It comes after the star's relationship with boyfriend Lewis Burton, 28, seemed to be on the rocks as they engaged in a furious argument during their Spanish holiday last week

The pair were caught in a tense discussion last Tuesday as they sat on board a luxury vessel while out at sea with a group of their friends in Ibiza.

They appeared to have several heated chats during the afternoon on the boat, as later on Caroline was pictured wearing a colourful striped kaftan as they continued their discussion.

It is unknown what Caroline and her former tennis star beau were talking about, however at one stage the TV presenter held up her phone and was showing Lewis something on the screen.

No drama here! The pair were caught in a tense discussion on Tuesday as they sat on board a luxury vessel while out at sea with a group of their friends in Ibiza

On the subject of their blossoming relationship, a source recently told The Sun: 'Caroline and Lewis were introduced through mutual friends and have really hit it off.

'They’ve been on several dates now and are getting on really well. Lewis has been a true gent to Caroline and has patiently waited to see her...

'They feel comfortable in each other’s company and it seems to be going in the right direction.'
